content.title: Wells Score DVT
content.definition: Clinical prediction rule for DVT probability: high (≥3 points), moderate (1-2), low (≤0).
content.statement: Wells Score DVT is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Dvt that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
